item.title: VPIP-3MIR30XVA IP camera PTZ with Video Analytics
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• 1/2.8" Progressive Scan CMOS
  • 30X Optical Zoom,16X Digital Zoom
  • 2048(H) × 1536(V)/25fps
  • Multiple Streams
  • IR Range 120m
  • Smart IR
  • Low bitrate, good low-light performance
  • 3D DNR, dWDR, ICR
  • Video Analytics included ( Perimeter , Single Virtual Fence , and Camera Tamper)
  • WDR more than 100dB
item.content:encoded:
Key Features

  • 1/2.8″ Progressive Scan CMOS
  • 30X Optical Zoom,16X Digital Zoom
  • 2048(H) × 1536(V)/25fps
  • Multiple Streams
  • IR Range 120m
  • Smart IR
  • Low bitrate, good low-light performance
  • 3D DNR, dWDR, ICR
  • Video Analytics included ( Perimeter , Single Virtual Fence , and Camera Tamper)
  • WDR more than 100dB
Megapixel 3 Megapixels
Resolution Max: 2048 x 1536 /30gps
Video Analytics Yes
Image Sensor 1/2.8”Progressive Scan CMOS
Illumination Color: 0.01 Lux; B&W: 0.001 Lux: IR ON 0 Lux
Day & Night ICR
Shutter Speed 1/10,000-1/1s
Iris Type Auto/Manual
Lens 30x module, 4.3 – 129 mm
Digital Zoom 16x
Field of View 70.5” – 3.2”
Pan/Tilt Speed PTZ Speed Pan 0.4°~350°/s, Tilt 0.4°~180°/s
Operating Temperature -40°C ~+70°C with Heater
Weight 9.4700
